A young ice cream maker on the Planet of Ice Cream creates a new flavor of ice cream that is so delicious that it becomes an instant hit. However, she soon discovers that the ice cream has the power to bring people's deepest desires to life, and she must use her newfound power wisely.

A group of ice cream truck drivers on the Planet of Ice Cream go on strike, demanding better working conditions and higher pay. However, the ice cream king and queen refuse to negotiate, and the drivers must find a way to stand up for themselves without causing a riot.

A group of space travelers on the Planet of Ice Cream discover a new species of alien that can only survive in extreme heat. They must find a way to bring the aliens to a new home on a different planet before they all die from the extreme cold on the Planet of Ice Cream.
